full_text:
UTILITIES.

	The beneficiary and/or trustee shall ensure that utility services to the property are not terminated if the property is lawfully occupied.

3.catch_line: Recordation Of Transfer Of Loan And/Or Deed Of Trust And/Or Assignment Of Rents.

5.catch_line: Maintenance And Enforcement Of Maintenance Requirements.

6.catch_line: Maintenance Of Vacant Properties And Enforcement Of Vacant Property Maintenance Requirements.

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

UTILITIES. (§ 164.07)

  UTILITIES.	The beneficiary and/or trustee shall ensure that utility services
to the property are not terminated if the property is lawfully occupied.
